                  Total Phase Aardvark Sample Code
                  --------------------------------

Introduction
------------
This directory contains examples that use the Aardvark Rosetta Python
language bindings.


Contents
--------
See top level EXAMPLES.txt for descriptions of each example.


Instructions
------------
The Total Phase API bindings support Python 2.5 - 3.6
Our sample code has been specifically written for Python 2.6, 2.7, 3.5+.
We will not be able to provide sample code for versions of Python not listed.

1) Download Python from:
http://www.python.org/

2) Install the Python package

3) Open a command shell and change to the examples directory

4) Type: 'python SCRIPT'
example: python aadetect.py
